mean_cn: n. 交易，办理，事务，学报
mean_en: a business deal :an occurrence in which goods, services, or money are passed from one person, account, etc., to another
word_etyma: transact交易 + ion名词后缀 → transaction 买卖
sentence: I paid him and he gave me the house--it was an easy transaction.
sentence_trans: 我给他钱，他给我房子—这是一笔轻松的交易。
